topic.title: Hospital Admission Medications Section Entries Optional - conformance rules

lines.i: The Hospital Admission Medications section defines the relevant medications administered prior to admission to the facility. The currently active medications must be listed.

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:10098, CONF:10392 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.44"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:15482)/@code="42346-7" MEDICATIONS ON ADMISSION (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:15483)

SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] entry (CONF:10102, CONF:10110)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Admission Medication (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.36)
